name: node-host
description: It is a host for app which manage water pump valves.

scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run start
scripts.stop: sudo kill -9 $(sudo lsof -t -i:3100) || true && killall -9 node || true
scripts.build:prod: NODE_ENV=production mkdir -p dist && cp -r server.js dist/ && cp -r src dist/

author: tm
